text: Édouard Kodjovi Kodjo, better known as Edem Kodjo (May 23, 1938 – April 11, 2020), was a Togolese politician and diplomat. He was Secretary-General of the Organisation of African Unity from 1978 to 1983; later. He was Prime Minister from 1994 to 1996 and again from 2005 to 2006. Kodjo was President of the Patriotic Pan-African Convergence (CPP)."Une démocratie en bonne santé" , Republicoftogo.com, January 12, 2007 . Kodjo died on April 11, 2020, in Paris at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Togo
title: Edem Kodjo
